QuestData.Title: Fat Long-Fat
QuestData.Description: You have been matched with a... special trainee. His name is Fat Long-Fat.$b$b<Thelonius chooses his words carefully.>$b$bFat Long-Fat... operates outside of the normal rules of combat. He does not fight every day, and when he does, he chooses his competitor. Today, for some reason... he has selected you.$b$bYou will find him atop Angkhal Pavilion.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Long-Fat is his name. Fat just describes him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Fat Long-Fat at the top of Angkhal Pavilion.
